name: Astralojia: Episode 1
description:
Taku will return to his home town to try to pass a strict entrance exam to a private academy, joining his two misfit friends who reluctantly accompany him. You'll follow these mages as they practice, grow, learn about and discover the mysteries of the universe of Astralojia.

  • Grind-free classic JRPG turn-based combat.
  • Uses skill bars.
  • Spar with other kids to purchase new abilities, level up to acquire new ability slots.
  • Clear bosses and skill challenges to advance through the story.
  • Local co-op gameplay for playing with up to 4 friends.
  • Released and structured in episodes, practical development, with frequent sequels.
